biotools.summary: Europe PMC citations viewer. It retrieves and displays the principal data (such as authors list, title, journal and source) either of a single citation or of the citations list that matches the query specified in the Europe PMC.

bioschemas.name: biojs-vis-pmccitation
bioschemas.summary: Europe PMC citations viewer. It retrieves and displays the principal data (such as authors list, title, journal and source) either of a single citation or of the citations list that matches the query specified in the Europe PMC.
